Reviews.Title: “Brand New!”
Reviews.Author: Tilt145
Reviews.Content: am amazed brand stayed quality inn horrible owners looks renovations complete picture look motel motel looks service excellent guess progress paying breakfast stood waffle machine else usual motel breakfasts actual design breakfast impressive internet signal par compared motels ive stayed definitely speed trouble figuring enter password location hard freeway time neighborhood overall am impressed stay looks motel tho

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for what we needed”
Reviews.Author: lcordova84
Reviews.Content: read reviews booking hotel nice stay dont frills didnt fancy decent sleep driving 1 night concert arena san diego hotel doesnt appearance outside nice residential close college reccommend doesnt freeway youre light sleeper noise bother friends plain clean inside beds pillows linens comfortable clean nice microwave refrigerator added touch morning breakfast waffles cereal muffins danishes fruit coffee juice available hours included rate 70 aaa discount value

HotelInfo.Name: Rodeway Inn Mission Valley
HotelInfo.Address: 5399 Adobe Falls Road, San Diego, CA 92120 (Formerly Quality Inn near Qualcomm Stadium)
